lead_paragraph: John Daly’s 2007 season will end today, a week earlier than he originally planned. Daly, a two-time major champion who remains one of the PGA Tour’s biggest draws, did not receive a sponsor’s exemption for next week’s season finale, the Children’s Miracle Network Classic at the Disney courses near Orlando, Fla., the first time he has made such a request and been denied.
